name: ssh
description: Kaholo Plugin with SSH utilities, such as remote command execution and secure copy.

params.name: username
params.description: Username to authenticate with the host.

params.name: password
params.description: Password to authenticate with the host. In case both SSH Key and Password parameters are provided, the SSH Key has priority.

params.name: privateKey
params.description: Key to authenticate with the host. This parameter accepts both the SSH key file content and a path to the SSH key file on the agent.

params.name: privateKeyPassphrase
params.description: Passphrase protecting the private key, set during key generation. Empty by default.

params.name: port
params.description: The port used to connect with SSH to the remote host.

params.name: command
params.description: The command to execute on the remote host

params.name: localPath
params.description: Path on the Kaholo agent to the file or directory to be copied

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path on the remote server to which the file or directory will be copied

params.name: localPath
params.description: Path on the Kaholo agent to which the file or directory will be copied

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path on the remote server to the file or directory to be copied

methods.name: secureCopyFromVaultToRemoteHost
methods.viewName: Secure Copy from Vault to Remote Host

params.name: vaultItem
params.description: Item from the Kaholo vault to upload to the remote host

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path on the remote server at which the vault item will be saved
